an5.60:1.1: Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato dullabho vuddhapabbajito.
an5.60:1.3: Dullabho, bhikkhave, vuddhapabbajito suvaco, dullabho suggahitaggahi, dullabho padakkhinaggahi, dullabho dhammakathiko, dullabho vinayadharo.
an5.60:1.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato dullabho vuddhapabbajito‚Äùti.
